welcome.title: Welcome to Wave Terminal
welcome.supportGithubDesc: We're open source and committed to providing a free terminal for individual users. Please show your support by giving us a star on Github (wavetermdev/waveterm)
welcome.joinCommunityDesc: Get help, submit feature requests, report bugs, or just chat with fellow terminal enthusiasts.
welcome.telemetryDesc: Anonymous usage data helps us improve features you use.

notelemetrystar.title: Telemetry Disabled ✓
notelemetrystar.noProblem: No problem, we respect your privacy.
notelemetrystar.needSupport: But, without usage data, we're flying blind. A GitHub star helps us know Wave is useful and worth maintaining.
